abstract: The Tesla co-founder reflects on his portrayal in "Revenge of the Electric Car," a documentary by the filmmaker Chris Paine opening in New York and Los Angeles on Friday.
snippet: The Tesla co-founder reflects on his portrayal in "Revenge of the Electric Car," a documentary by the filmmaker Chris Paine opening in New York and Los Angeles on Friday.

headline.main: As Documentary Rolls Out, Elon Musk Considers His 'Revenge'
